content.query:
USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_dim_geography
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.dim_geography') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_geography;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_geography
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_geography',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  [GeographyKey], 
  [City], 
  [EnglishCountryRegionName] AS [Country Name], 
  [SalesTerritoryRegion], 
  [SalesTerritoryGroup], 
  [PostalCode], 
  g.[SalesTerritoryKey] 
FROM 
  bronze.dim_geography g 
  JOIN bronze.dim_sales_territory t ON g.SalesTerritoryKey = t.SalesTerritoryKey;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_dim_geography;
SELECT * FROM silver.dim_geography;
